head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SOBRERO, AQUILES J. M.D.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SOBRERO, AQUILES J. M.D.

block.p: SOBRERO--Aquiles J. M.D., age 85 of Chicago. Professor Emeritus at Northwestern University. Professor at University of Illinois-Chicago. Director at Margaret Sanger Research Bureau-NY. Beloved husband of Adela. Loving father of Maria, Charles and Raul. Proud grandfather of three. Services were private and provided by DuPage Cremations, Ltd. 800-588-1132.
